frontmatter.title: Books Are Unsustainable
frontmatter.short: Video games, said Burton, is where kids are going to absorb the myths of our culture.  The old model of creating books from trees is not sustainable. He urges the audience to embrace digital media.  He speaks about the power of visual media and the power of video games.  Moving pictures and sounds can tell a story on multiple levels, conscious and unconscious.
frontmatter.keywords: LeVar Burton, data driven storytelling, data driven culture
